Name: Archipelago
About the game: Archipelago is a tower defense game about defending randomly generated islands. Setup your defenses, manage your income, and find powerful charms to repel the enemy. Archipelago introduces tension and strategy to the tower defense genre. Setup defenses Choose the right mix of units and their placement to maximize both your income and your odds of surviving the wave. Find the perfect strategy Take advantage of combinations of units and the environment to find the perfect strategy to repel the enemy. Find powerful charms Manage your income Archipelago is all about risk/reward. Units must be paid a salary every wave. Play it safe with a lot of units, or take a risk with a few units but a higher income.
